name: aristocratic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
belonging to a class of people who hold high social rank: an aristocratic family His aristocratic manner alienated many voters. See
aristocrat
More examplesFewer examplesWe were surprised when we learned of his aristocratic lineage.Her mother is a member of a powerful aristocratic family.A sense of decorum was bred into him by his aristocratic Virginian upbringing.
